actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the estate tax exemption and to increase the lifetime gift tax exemption.

summary.text: Estate and Gift Tax Act - Increases the estate tax exemption, under the Internal Revenue Code, to $120,000 in the case of the estate of a decedent dying after December 31, 1979. Increases the specific exemption for gift tax to $60,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the estate tax exemption and to increase the lifetime gift tax exemption.
